mechanics.outcome: A 60-foot radius sphere of negative energy emanates from the chosen point, targeting each creature within it

mechanics.condition: Creature is within the 60-foot radius sphere
mechanics.outcome: Target must make a Constitution saving throw

mechanics.condition: Target succeeded on the saving throw
mechanics.outcome: Target takes half of 8d6 necrotic damage

description_text: A sphere of negative energy ripples out in a 60-foot radius sphere from a point within range. Each creature in that area must make a constitution saving throw. A target takes 8d6 necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
